content.raw_text: From: Skillshare No-Reply <no-reply@skillshare.com> Reply-To: support@skillshare.com To: emily.r@gmail.com Subject: Your Skillshare Premium subscription is now active Date: Mon, 19 Jun 2023 08:30:00 -0700 Message-ID: <20230619083000.001@skillshare.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Hi Emily R., Thanks for subscribing to Skillshare Premium! You now have unlimited access to thousands of classes and exclusive features. Plan: Annual Price: $168.00 Renewal Date: June 19, 2026 To manage your subscription, visit your account settings here: https://www.skillshare.com/account/settings Happy learning! — The Skillshare Team --- Skillshare Inc. | 123 Skillshare Lane, San Francisco, CA 94105 If you did not sign up for this subscription, please contact support@skillshare.com.

From: Skillshare Billing <billing@skillshare.com> Reply-To: billing@skillshare.com To: alex.designs@gmail.com Subject: Your payment was successful Date: Wed, 19 Jun 2024 10:45:00 -0700 Message-ID: <20240619104500.002@skillshare.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Hi alex.designs, We've successfully processed your payment for your Skillshare Premium subscription. Amount Charged: $168.00 Payment Date: June 19, 2024 Card Ending: **** 4242 You can view your receipt and manage your subscription here: https://www.skillshare.com/account/billing Thank you for being a part of Skillshare! — Team Skillshare

From: Skillshare No-Reply <no-reply@skillshare.com> Reply-To: support@skillshare.com To: priya.sketches@gmail.com Subject: Your Premium subscription will renew soon Date: Thu, 25 Jun 2025 09:00:00 -0700 Message-ID: <20250625090000.003@skillshare.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Hi Priya.Sketches, Just a reminder — your Skillshare Premium subscription will automatically renew on June 30, 2025. Plan: Monthly Amount: $14.00 If you’d like to make changes or cancel, head over to your account settings before your renewal date: https://www.skillshare.com/account/settings Thanks for learning with us! — Skillshare Support

From: Skillshare No-Reply <no-reply@skillshare.com> Reply-To: support@skillshare.com To: daniel.creative@gmail.com Subject: Your subscription has been renewed Date: Tue, 01 Jul 2025 08:30:00 -0700 Message-ID: <20250701083000.004@skillshare.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Hello DanielCreative, Your Premium subscription has been successfully renewed. Renewal Date: July 1, 2025 Plan: Monthly Amount Charged: $14.00 Your access to all Premium features continues uninterrupted. — The Skillshare Team

From: Skillshare Billing <billing@skillshare.com> Reply-To: billing@skillshare.com To: emma.reads.art@gmail.com Subject: We couldn’t process your payment Date: Wed, 19 Jun 2025 09:15:00 -0700 Message-ID: <20250619091500.005@skillshare.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Hi emma.reads.art, We were unable to process your recent payment for your Premium subscription. From: Skillshare Support <support@skillshare.com> Reply-To: support@skillshare.com To: rahul_skills@gmail.com Subject: Your Premium subscription has been cancelled Date: Thu, 15 Jul 2025 11:00:00 -0700 Message-ID: <20250715110000.006@skillshare.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Hi rahul_skills, Your Premium subscription has been successfully cancelled. From: Skillshare No-Reply <no-reply@skillshare.com> Reply-To: support@skillshare.com To: sophia.ux.studio@gmail.com Subject: Your Premium access is about to end Date: Tue, 14 Jul 2025 10:00:00 -0700 Message-ID: <20250714100000.007@skillshare.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Hi sophia.ux.studio, Your Premium subscription is expiring soon. Click below to renew and keep learning: https://www.skillshare.com/account/renew Thanks for being a part of our community. — Skillshare

From: Skillshare Hello <hello@skillshare.com> Reply-To: support@skillshare.com To: jason.learning.art@gmail.com Subject: Welcome to Skillshare Premium! Date: Fri, 12 May 2023 07:30:00 -0700 Message-ID: <20230512073000.010@skillshare.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Hi jason.learning.art, Welcome aboard! You’ve unlocked unlimited classes, offline access, and more. Get started with these top picks: Creative Writing Masterclass Intro to UI/UX Design Enjoy your journey! — The Skillshare Team

Amount Charged: $168.00 Plan: Annual We’re excited to keep learning with you! — Team Skillshare

From: Skillshare Support support@skillshare.com To: sneha.learning.space@gmail.com Subject: Your subscription has been paused Date: Tue, 10 Jun 2025 09:30:00 -0700 Message-ID: <20250610093000.015@skillshare.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Hi sneha.learning.space, You’ve successfully paused your Premium subscription. You’ll retain access until July 15, 2025, after which billing will stop. You can resume anytime from your account dashboard. — The Skillshare Team

From: Skillshare Hello hello@skillshare.com To: rachel.m@gmail.com Subject: Welcome to Skillshare Premium Date: Mon, 23 Apr 2025 11:00:00 -0700 Message-ID: <20250423110000.016@skillshare.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Hi Rachel.M, Thank you for becoming a Skillshare Premium Member! You can now enjoy unlimited access to thousands of online classes and watch them offline through our mobile apps. You’ve signed up for an Annual Plan and will be automatically billed on an annual basis. Your next charge: $96.00 Next billing date: Sunday, April 24th, 2016 Membership Paid: $0.99 🎁 Get your Membership for Free Invite a friend to Skillshare and you’ll each get a free month of Membership when they join. Enjoy your creative journey! — Skillshare Membership Team

From: Skillshare Billing billing@skillshare.com To: maria.art.creates@gmail.com Subject: Payment retry attempt failed Date: Wed, 20 May 2025 10:00:00 -0700 Message-ID: <20250520100000.017@skillshare.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Hi maria.art.creates, We tried to process your payment again for your Premium subscription, but it was unsuccessful.
